WorkItem.Description:
Wishlistitem...
 
In the SP aspnet_Membership_UpdateUser the LastActivityDate is in UTC.
 
Im my situation that means time is off by 2 hours.
Would it be something for the CSK if users could alter this according to their local situation. 
(It would be great if times would follow DST and back)
I am not sure but I guess this goes for other tables as well, like Forums and so on.

Comments.Message: I'm sure its just an issue b/c it was first developed on my machine. I would clear the asp.net membership provider tables... see if that helps.
